Title: Trouble in Lumpy Space
Writer: Pendleton Ward (created by), Merriwether Williams (story by), Timothy McKeon (story by), Elizabeth Ito, Adam Muto, Timothy McKeon (staff writer)
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Hynden Walch, Pendleton Ward
Plot: Jake is bitten by Lumpy Space Princess and begins to transform into a Lumpy being. In order to find a cure, Finn is travels to Lumpy Space.
